products.title: KiTEC Industries (INDIA) Pvt. Ltd.
products.description: Being the Pioneer of multilayer pipes (PE-AL-PE) in India since 1996, KiTEC is now been recognised for its excellence in quality KiTEC pipe uses special polyethylene grade which is hygienic, non-toxic and smooth. The middle aluminum layer is impermeable. This structure provides KiTEC pipe the advantages of both metal and plastic while avoiding all the weaknesses associated with these materials.

products.title: HP ADHESIVES
products.description: HP Adhesives is a leading provider of adhesives and sealants. Our commitment to delivering world-class products and services to our customers drives us forward. We have strongly emphasized the quality, standard and price of our diverse range of products. Our dedicated research & development team is a mix of Indian and International capabilities that is constantly striving at improving our product range and building newer capabilities. With our constant drive for innovation, we have grown aggressively in various businesses and products, matching them with international standards. This has helped us launch over 25 unique products under the HP Adhesives Limited banner.

products.title: ATUL
products.description: Atul is a pioneer in manufacturing epoxy resins in India. The Company is one of the largest manufacturers of epoxy resins and hardeners in the country. The epoxy products are marketed and sold under the brand name of Lapox and that of synthetic rubber and PU based adhesives under the brand name of Polygrip. A new range of maintenance products are being marketed under the brand name of Lacare.

products.title: ZYDEX
products.description: Traditional waterproofing methods rely on chemicals and membranes that create a surface barrier like an umbrella or band-aid to prevent water from entering civil structures. However, they are limited in their ability to penetrate micro cracks and pore channels. Over time, these products tend to peel and crack due to thermal and UV degradation, resulting in a failed waterproofing system.Zydex has developed a revolutionary nanotechnology-based waterproofing solution that creates a chemical bond with the surface. This advanced penetrative nanotechnology can penetrate the structure, altering its basic nature from hydrophilic to hydrophobic, thereby making it water-resistant. This effectively prevents water from entering and slows down the aging process of the structure, leading to a significant increase in its lifespan and optimal use of resources.

companyItems.itemDesc: Organosilane technology offers a reactive, penetrative, and permanent solution that is easy to apply, breathable, and UV resistant. It effectively waterproofs vertical and horizontal surfaces while protecting against algae, fungal growth, and weathering-related substrate deterioration.

Organosilane technology is a reactive, penetrative, and permanent solution that penetrates up to 4 mm and requires no membrane. Easy to apply and suitable for both vertical and horizontal surfaces, it is breathable and UV resistant. It protects against algae and fungal growth while preventing substrate deterioration due to weathering.

This multipurpose and economical sealing and bonding agent offers excellent wet adhesion and universal compatibility. It ensures superior bonding to cementitious concrete and plaster surfaces and serves as a high-performance cement admixture.

This product offers extremely strong adhesion on cementitious surfaces, making it a reliable choice for various applications. It is also easy to apply, ensuring a hassle-free experience. Additionally, it boasts high water resistance, providing long-lasting durability.

This high-elongation elastomeric waterproofing membrane features crosslinking and UV durability with an impressive 250% elongation. It can also be used as a mortar mix with sand and cement, providing versatile and robust waterproofing solutions.

This product forms a reactive bond with concrete and plaster surfaces, creating a strong and flexible joint that's virtually monolithic. With a high pull-off strength of 17 N/mm2, it ensures a durable and long-lasting bond. Additionally, its high water resistance makes it an ideal choice for applications where moisture is present.

This white stretchable membrane offers excellent durability and crack-bridging properties, with a service life of up to 5 years. It can accommodate cracks up to 1.5 mm and is resistant to UV degradation, ensuring long-lasting performance. For optimal results, it is recommended to use this membrane in combination with Zycosil+.

This white stretchable membrane is a ready-to-use solution that offers excellent durability and crack-bridging properties, stretching up to 1.5 mm. It is also UV resistant and crosslinking, ensuring a long-lasting performance with a 5-year service life.
Compression Type End Connection Quarter Turn Isolating Ball Valve for (PE-Al-PE) Composite Pressure Pipes.

This product improves workability, enhances concrete quality, and minimizes porosity and honeycombing. It also increases setting time, leading to higher strength and overall better concrete performance. By using this product, you can achieve a more durable and long-lasting concrete structure.
Compression Type End Connection Quarter Turn Isolating Ball Valve for (PE-Al-PE) Composite Pressure Pipes.

This solution reduces porosity and provides excellent water resistance and wet adhesion. It offers strong bonding (17 N/mm) to cementitious concrete and plaster surfaces, ensuring durable and reliable performance.

This elastomeric waterproofing membrane boasts high elongation properties, stretching up to 175% depending on the amount of grey cement added. It forms an excellent bond with various surfaces, including cement, metal, and stone, and offers superior durability with crosslinking and UV resistance for up to 5 years

services.title: Termite Treatment
services.description: Being the Pioneer of multilayer pipes (PE-AL-PE) in India since 1996, KiTEC is now been recognised for its excellence in quality KiTEC pipe uses special polyethylene grade which is hygienic, non-toxic and smooth. The middle aluminum layer is impermeable. This structure provides KiTEC pipe the advantages of both metal and plastic while avoiding all the weaknesses associated with these materials.
